sources.title: The Mysterious Rider
sources.description: Escaping from the Marshal, Billy (Buster Crabbe) and Fuzzy (Al St. John) ride to Laramy only to find it a ghost town. Sykes (John Merton) and his gang have driven people away while they look for the gold mine of a man they have killed. Billy hopes to straighten things out, but is in more trouble when his true identity becomes known.

metadata.Plot: Escaping from the Marshal, Billy and Fuzzy ride to Laramy only to find it a ghost town. Billy hopes to straighten things out, but is in more trouble when his true identity becomes known.
metadata.Actors: Buster Crabbe, Al St. John, Caroline Burke
